page.title: 18Food
page.content:
Three of us investigated the food we eat on four days of the week. {Kim Rita Pippa {Sunday } All have 'Sunday' Roast {Monday} Fry-up Saus.& Liver {Tuesday } Stew {Thursday } Roast {Friday } All have Fish and Chips {Saturday } Cottage Curry Pie
A class survey shows the most liked foods are Mild Curry with Rice,Steak & Chips and Sausages & Chips.It also appears that whatever children eat - they like it with Chips! It is said that Fish & Chips is the National Food of Britain.We have counted 4 Fish & Chip Shops in our Survey Area.
